content.value: During these COVID and Post COVID situations, depending on home delivery and normal shopping system are vulnerable. This project was based on developing an e-commerce website that is capable of bringing a normal shopping system and the optimum solution to the challenges involved in making effective social distancing.

The purpose of this project is to help people to buy and book services according to their needs , base on a time slot sitting at home thereby reducing the exposure to outside environment especially during this pandemic.
